data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In United States law, a reversible error is an error of sufficient gravity to warrant reversal of a judgment on appeal. It ____ an ____ by ____ trier ____ law ( judge ), ____ the ____ of ____ ( ____ jury, or ____ judge ____ it ____ a ____ trial ), ____ malfeasance ____ one ____ the ____ attorneys, which ____ in ____ unfair ____. It is to be distinguished from harmless errors which do not rise to a level which brings the validity of the judgment into question and thus do not lead to a reversal upon appeal.
data.partBlankContent: In United States law, a reversible error is an error of sufficient gravity to warrant reversal of a judgment on appeal. It i_ an er___ by t__ trier o_ law ( judge ), o_ the tr___ of fa__ ( t__ jury, or t__ judge i_ it i_ a be___ trial ), o_ malfeasance b_ one o_ the try___ attorneys, which res____ in a_ unfair tr___. It is to be distinguished from harmless errors which do not rise to a level which brings the validity of the judgment into question and thus do not lead to a reversal upon appeal.
data.answer: 在美国法律中，可逆转的错误是指严重程度足以使上诉判决被推翻的错误。这是法律审判官(法官)或事实审判官(陪审团，如果是法官审判，则是法官)的失误，或审判律师之一的渎职行为，导致不公平审判。这与无害的错误是不同的，无害的错误不会上升到使判决的有效性受到质疑的程度，因此不会在上诉时导致撤销判决。
